name: Dashing Switcheroo
description:
This is my submission to the GeoJam 2021. I decided to stick to both the geometric shape idea and the theme. I only used build-in Unity shapes, and all the sounds and music were made by me.

WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS CAN BE FOUND IN THE GAME!

Controls:

  • Move: AD or left-right arrow keys
  • Switch: S or down arrow key
  • Jump: Space (the longer you hold the higher you jump)
  • Reset level: R
  • Other controls are told to you ingame.

Be sure to leave your best time as a comment! :P
